data.instruction: Create a primary location for the biz and set timezone aligned with scenario context.
data.expectedResult: Location exists and is associated with the new biz.

data.instruction: Invite a biz member, assign an operational role, and verify that member can authenticate into the same biz.
data.expectedResult: Biz member account/session exists with scoped role permissions.

data.instruction: Update offer publish/lifecycle flags so customer actors can discover it.
data.expectedResult: Offer appears as published/active and can be returned in customer-facing list queries.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Create a booking order using the published offer version with realistic times and monetary totals.
data.expectedResult: Booking order is created and linked to offer/offer version with coherent totals.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Peer-to-Peer Equipment Rental (Fat Llama Style). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.

data.instruction: Using credentials from another context, attempt to read or mutate booking/order resources for this biz.
data.expectedResult: Request is rejected with forbidden/unauthorized error and no data leakage.

resultPayload.note: Cross-biz read blocked for non-member account.
